title: Pasta
creator_contributor_role: KQED-TV (Television station : San Francisco, Calif.), production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cookery
description: Episode of Series "Cooking at the Academy". Enjoy the rewards of delicate homemade pasta with its own delicious sauce. The fundamentals of preparing "Basic Egg Pasta" are explained with simple variations such as "Lemon Dill Pasta". Learn to roll out, cut and cook the dough and match the cuts and weights of noodles with the right sauces. As the lesson progresses, the following recipes are shown: "Spinach Fettucine Alfredo", Ravioli of Bay Shrimp and Goat Cheese in White Clam Sauce" and "Whole Wheat Papparadelle with Andouilles and Peas."
related_objects: Series; S01150; Cooking at the Academy; Active; 1991
